item.title: Keppel Land enhances marketing strategy with virtual show suites
item.description:
Keppel Land is the first developer in Singapore to utilize Oculus Rift technology to create 360-degree immersive virtual reality (VR) show suites for its Highline Residences property. These two digitally rendered suites complement the three existing physical show suites at the Highline Residences showroom in Singapore. The new VR platform, a collaboration between Keppel Land and visualisation firm VMW Group, features virtual tours of these new unit layouts. It also allows for a virtual exploration of key landmarks in the trendy Tiong Bahru neighborhood where Highline Residences is located...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/keppel-land-enhances-marketing-strategy-with-virtual-show-suites/
